attributes.action: TAKE AWAY ANY HUMAN RIGHTS OF CONVICTED CHILD MURDERER,S.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Dear Ms Stevens

We cannot include this petition on the site as it includes references to a sensitive legal case. 

If you would like to re-submit the petitions taking out any personal references to this case, then we could allow it onto the site. The title is fine, it's just the detail that needs amending.

Your other alternative is to contact the Ministry of Justice directly. Their contact details are:

general.queries@justice.gsi.gov.uk

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Information which may be protected by an injunction or court order
